build.name: tz
build.build_command: python trustzone_images/build/ms/build_all.py -j1 CHIPSET=sdm660 --branch TZ.BF.4.0 USES_FLAGS=USES_NO_CP SIGNSERVER=lab4106.ap.qualcomm.com SIGNTYPE=CASS SIGNPORT=50060

build.name: wlan
build.build_command: cd ./wlan_proc/build/ms; sh build.sh 660.wlanfw_adrastea_dy.eval thread_mode=mt -k --buildspec=klocwork BUILD_VER=00087 static_mem_stats=y

build.name: wdsp
build.build_command: cd wdsp_proc && python build/build.py -c wcd9340 -o all --pkg --hy22
